name: Elements (Eilohhs)
description:
A game in which you take the role of a person who had been given the mission to collect an array of cards, each containing an element (Water, Earth, Fire, Darkness and Air). 
Convince the five characters, each with their own motive, to give you the card they possess, in order to reach the goal of keeping the world from destruction.

Walkthrough -- https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=55&t=56916

CONTAINS:

- intro video
- original artwork
- roughly 10-15 minutes of gameplay

MUSIC:

Kevin Macleod -- incompetech.com
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0

NOTES:

--This game was made with the intention of learning new techniques and possibilities around the structure in which I build my projects. 

--The story in this game has no real impact or consequences to the fictional world in which it takes place.

You can get the full resolution visual assets used in game + poster size images used in cards, for 3$.
